actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

official_title: To provide that each State may establish a pilot program for mediation of private rights of action under the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act.
short_title: Voluntary State Pilot Mediation Program for MSWPA Lawsuits Act of 1998

summary.text: Voluntary State Pilot Mediation Program for MSWPA Lawsuits Act of 1998 - Authorizes States to establish a pilot program for mediation of private rights of action under the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act.

titles.title: Voluntary State Pilot Mediation Program for MSWPA Lawsuits Act of 1998
To provide that each State may establish a pilot program for mediation of private rights of action under the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act.
